Generation V.Black: It fights by swinging a piece of lumber around. It is close to evolving when it can handle the lumber without difficulty.
Generation V.White: These Pokémon appear at building sites and help out with construction. They always carry squared logs.
Generation V.Black 2: Always carrying squared logs, they help out with construction. As they grow, they carry bigger logs.
Generation V.White 2: Always carrying squared logs, they help out with construction. As they grow, they carry bigger logs.

Generation VI.X: These Pokémon appear at building sites and help out with construction. They always carry squared logs.
Generation VI.Y: Always carrying squared logs, they help out with construction. As they grow, they carry bigger logs.
Generation VI.Omega Ruby: These Pokémon appear at building sites and help out with construction. They always carry squared logs.
Generation VI.Alpha Sapphire: Always carrying squared logs, they help out with construction. As they grow, they carry bigger logs.

Generation VIII.Sword: It loves helping out with construction projects. It loves it so much that if rain causes work to halt, it swings its log around and throws a tantrum.
Generation VIII.Shield: Timburr that have started carrying logs that are about three times their size are nearly ready to evolve.

Generation IX.Scarlet: Always carrying squared logs, they help out with construction. As they grow, they carry bigger logs.
Generation IX.Violet: It fights by swinging a piece of lumber around. It is close to evolving when it can handle heavy lumber without difficulty.

Generation V.Black 2: Relic Passage Pinwheel Forest (outside) ( N's Pokémon )
Generation V.White 2: Relic Passage Pinwheel Forest (outside) ( N's Pokémon )
